```{r "setup", include=F,echo=F, warning=F, error=F}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
library(ggplot2)
library(glue)
library(googlesheets4)
library(knitr)

opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, 
               warning=FALSE, 
               # fig.margin = TRUE,
               message = FALSE
)
options(knitr.kable.NA = '')

scholar_id <- "7NkxgWQAAAAJ"
cv_id <- "1-XrhCvZ1x_Fwz4vYrz2nRzdizblddlvkgyGidcTtD4k"

path <- "aboutme-update.json"
raw  <- readBin(path, "raw", file.size(path))
json <- sodium::data_decrypt(
  bin = raw, 
  key = sodium::sha256(charToRaw(Sys.getenv("DRMOWINCKELS_PASSWORD"))), 
  nonce = gargle:::secret_nonce()
)

googledrive::drive_auth(path = rawToChar(json))
```


<img src="img/profile.png" align="left" width="40%" style="padding: 1em; border:none; background: transparent; box-shadow: none;">

I am a cognitive neuroscientist based in Oslo, Norway, and works at the [Center for Lifespan Changes in Brain and Cognition](www.oslobrains.no). I'm passionate about cognitive neuroscience, using R and teaching the world the wonders of R. Doing all I can to improve gender diversity in the R-community though [RLadies-Oslo](https://twitter.com/RLadies_Oslo). 


# Education  

```{r education}
sheets_read(cv_id, sheet = "education") %>% 
  transmute(
    When = ifelse(is.na(end) | is.null(end), start, glue("{start} - {end}")),
    Where =  ifelse(is.na(location) | is.null(location), place, glue("{place} - {location}")),
    Degree = degree,
    Subject = glue("{field} <br> _{thesis}_")
  ) %>% 
  kable("markdown", booktabs = T)
```

# Teaching & Organising 
In addition to teaching and workshops, I run a coding and neuroscience blog, [drmowinckels.io](https://drmowinckels.io) that includes tutorials in R and neuroimaging. I am also a certified [Software Carpentry Instructor](https://software-carpentry.org/).

# Research software development

A recent interest and professional endeavor is creating R-packages to improve data workflows and visualization in R.

```{r r-pkgs}

sheets_read(cv_id, sheet = "software") %>%  
  mutate(gh_icon = fontawesome::fa("github", fill = "#004d4d"),
         docs_icon = fontawesome::fa("globe", fill = "#004d4d")) %>% 
  transmute(
    Software =  glue("**{package}** <br> [{gh_icon}]({github}) [{docs_icon}]({docs})"),
    Role = role, 
    Purpose = purpose,
    When = ifelse(!is.na(end), glue("{start} - {end}"), start)
  ) %>% 
  kable(booktabs = TRUE, escape = FALSE)
```


# Publications & Preprints

```{r "pubPlot", dev.args = list(bg = 'transparent'), out.width= "65%"}
scholar::get_citation_history(scholar_id) %>%
  mutate(cumulative=cumsum(cites)) %>%
  gather(metric, val, -1) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=year, y=val, group=metric, fill=metric, colour=metric)) +
  geom_line(lineend="round") +
  geom_point(show.legend = F) +
  labs(
    y="Googe citations", x="Year",
       colour = "",
       title = "Citations over time",
       subtitle = "retrieved from google scholar",
       caption = paste("Updated:", format(Sys.time(), "%d-%m-%Y"))
       ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(panel.grid.major = element_line(color="#4E67691F"),
        legend.position = "bottom",
        axis.line = element_line(),
        text = element_text(color="#4E6769"),
        line = element_line(color="#4E6769")) +
  scale_color_manual(values=c("#008080", "#004d4d"))
```

```{r "pubList", results='asis'}
scholar::get_publications("7NkxgWQAAAAJ") %>% 
  arrange(desc(year)) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(year), !is.na(journal), journal != "") %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  mutate_all(as.character) %>%
  mutate(
    when = ifelse(grepl("rxiv", journal, ignore.case = TRUE),
                  glue("Preprint <br> {year}"),
                  year), 
    author = str_replace(author, "Mowinckel", "**Mowinckel**"),
    author = str_replace(author, "\\.\\.\\.", "et al."),
    journal = str_replace(journal, "&", "and"),
    number = ifelse(number =="", " ", number),
    cid = glue("https://scholar.google.no/scholar?oi=bibs&hl=en&cluster={cid}"),
    journal = glue("[{journal} {number}]({cid})") 
  ) %>% 
  transmute(
    when = when,
    paper = glue("{author} <br> _{title}_: <br> {journal}"),
    cites = cites,
  ) %>% 
  kable("markdown", booktabs = T) 
```
